title: Varbase Components/Atoms/Badge
desc: Documentation and examples for badges, our small count and labeling component.

html_tag.name: HTML Tag
html_tag.desc: The HTML tag to use for the bade. Defaults to span.

color.name: Background and Text Color
color.description: Set a background-color with contrasting foreground color with our .text-bg-{color} helpers. Previously it was required to manually pair your choice of .text-{color} and .bg-{color} utilities for styling, which you still may use if you prefer.

url.name: URL Link
url.description: URL link for Badge when the HTML tag is an anchor link.

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom CSS classes over to this to this component.
